title: Premiere: Amy Yon – Amy
body:
Having already supported the likes of SOAK, Rhodes and Port Isla, it’s safe to say that 21 year old **Amy Yon** has really hit the ground running in 2015.

With festival slots coming up at Dot 2 Dot, Boardmasters and Barn on the Farm, it comes as a surprise to learn that she’s yet to release a note of music, instead using her sterling live performances to garner a growing fan base. Her self-titled debut sees her bewitching vocal set against her captivatingly honest lyrics; making for one of the finest first outings of the year. _Amy_ is storytelling of the highest order, beautiful and deeply absorbing, suggesting that we’ll be hearing a lot more from Amy Yon in the near future. Check it out below, alongside information on her upcoming shows.

Sat 23rd May – Dot2Dot Festival, Bristol, Thekla Top Deck

Sun 5th July – Barn On The Farm Festival, Wooden Barn Stage

Fri 24th July – Somersault Festival, The Bandstand

Sun 9th August – Boardmasters Festival, View Stage
